CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Merchandise Purchase stage positioned above or below the Fan Engagement stage?
SRP.A: The Merchandise Purchase stage is positioned {below} the Fan Engagement stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Event Feedback?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Event Feedback is {115}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Event Attendance?
VE.A: The value of stage Event Attendance is {358}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Ticket Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Ticket Purchase is {512}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Ticket Purchase, with a value of {512}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Merchandise Purchase, with a value of {100}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Event Attendance to stage Fan Engagement?
SC.A: Decreased by {146} Participants from stage Event Attendance to stage Fan Engagement.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Ticket Purchase to stage Event Attendance?
SC.A: Decreased by {154} Participants from stage Ticket Purchase to stage Event Attendance.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Event Feedback to stage Merchandise Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {15} Participants from stage Post-Event Feedback to stage Merchandise Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 163? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Ticket Purchase} stage has {512}, the {Event Attendance} stage has {358}, the {Fan Engagement} stage has {212}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 285? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Fan Engagement} stage has {212}, the {Post-Event Feedback} stage has {115}, the {Merchandise Purchase} stage has {100}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 107 and 435? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Event Attendance} stage has {358}, the {Fan Engagement} stage has {212}, the {Post-Event Feedback} stage has {115}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Event Attendance to Fan Engagement, or from stage Ticket Purchase to Event Attendance?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Ticket Purchase} to {Event Attendance} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Event Attendance to Fan Engagement, or from stage Fan Engagement to Post-Event Feedback?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Event Attendance} to {Fan Engagement} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Ticket Purchase to Event Attendance, from stage Post-Event Feedback to Merchandise Purchase, or from stage Fan Engagement to Post-Event Feedback?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Ticket Purchase} to stage {Event Attendance} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Ticket Purchase} and {Event Attendance} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Event Feedback} and {Merchandise Purchase} stages.
